projects.name: CodeBerry
projects.description: CodeBerry is a fully localized & gamified coding school for non-English speakers who want to change their careers.

projects.name: YearCompass
projects.description: YearCompass is a booklet that helps close your year and plan the next one. New Year's resolutions don't work; planning your year does.

projects.name: Invisible University International
projects.description: Invisible University helps university students and young adults to learn life skills such as time management, personal finances, mindfulness in peer groups.

projects.name: Sites Against Humanity
projects.description: Saw an awful site? Shoot it into the sun!

projects.name: NEVES
projects.description: The NEVES patient safety reporting system helps healthcare organisations improve patient safety by making incident data collection and analysis easy and visually appealing.

projects.name: Healthcare best practices
projects.description: Collecting best practices that are applicable to improve patient safety within hospitals.

media.name: Talking about remote work during the COVID-19 outbreak (2020-03)
media.description: A live session with DreamJobs talking about HR and remote work based on the experience with CodeBerry

media.name: Talking about year planning and yearly reflection in Kossuth Rádió (2019-12)
media.description: Participating as a guest in the year closing broadcast in Kossuth Rádió, talking about YearCompass [from 18:20].

media.name: A live session with Peter Balogh, CEO of BaConsult (2019-11)
media.description: Joining for a live session with Peter Balogh, talking about early startup life.

media.name: YearCompass in Forbes (2019-01)
media.description: An article about the YearCompass movement in the Hungarian Forbes magazine in 2019

media.name: CodeBerry EU Top 50 pitch (2018-11)
media.description: Pitching CodeBerry in the EU Parliament participating in the EU Top 50 competition in 2018
